statIntellect.name: Intellect
statIntellect.description:
Decreases the cooldown of your super ability.

Intellect can be increased by your Armor.

statDiscipline.name: Discipline
statDiscipline.description:
Discipline decreases the cooldown time of your grenades, allowing you to use them more often.

Find and equip armor with Discipline to boost this effect.

statStrength.name: Strength
statStrength.description:
Strength reduces the cooldown time of your melee ability, allowing you to use it more often.

Find and equip armor with Strength to boost this effect.

items.itemDescription: Draw from the Void. Light the way.
~replicate~ devastate your foes ~consume~ Herja ~repeat
Forged in honor of Gheleon, he who taught us to cherish both the rainy days and the sunny.
Diluvian 10/4x: Tossed upon the seas of war and ~SIVA
For Ghosts whose Guardians have stood against SIVA.
Crucible variant. Now less likely to decouple neural connections.
Let's get right to it. How can Clovis Bray help the Exodus project? ~SIVA.MEM.CL001
We've found a way to push our matter encryption technology even further. ~SIVA.MEM.WB002
"Hey, if it works for computers…" —Marcus Ren
"When we hunt together, we cannot fail." —Fractal Scrolls
"Our lives are no longer our own. We have sworn them in service to the Traveler, and to humanity." —Lord Radegast
The sound of beautiful destruction.
The heroes of the Iron Banner are never truly gone.
Obtain this Quest in Destiny to learn more.
So bored…

items.itemDescription: The wall against which the Darkness breaks.
~replicate~ devastate your foes ~consume~ Herja ~repeat
Forged in honor of Gheleon, he who taught us to cherish both the rainy days and the sunny.
With your own hands you forged the mighty Dark-Drinker. Now take it in hand and slake its thirst.
For Ghosts who scouted the Dreadnaught and lived to tell the tale.
Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.
Doctor Bray, I'm sure you've realized SIVA's applications extend beyond colonization. ~SIVA.MEM.CL011
For This, There Is One Remedy
Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.
The Exodus program would be interested in exploring SIVA's defensive applications. ~SIVA.MEM.CL013
A piece of the Fire Victorious, the ever-burning flame of the Titan Firebreak order.
"Our weapons were keen, our Sparrows nimble, our laughter loud and bold." —Lord Saladin
The sound of beautiful destruction.
Lead from the front.
Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.
It's a smash hit!

items.itemDescription: Harmony within, hurricane without.
It's a long road. Enjoy it.
An advanced energy weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.
"To crack open that depraved Earth-Servitor. To use its secrets to reclaim the Great Machine..." —Translated from Fallen Language
For Ghosts who serve the Vanguard.
Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.
"The dead come for these, but the dead should not have them." —Crumpled note pinned in the clasp
Well, SIVA requires no external power source, so…forever. ~SIVA.MEM.WB007
Crucible variant. Element shift allows for optimal sprinting, jumping, and holding position.
"Prime no longer. No primes but we."
"I will fight to stop the fighting. If that means I must die, then I choose death." —Lord Colovance
The nights are colder now. We must bring the Light.
Blow your own horn.
Come, let me clutch thee.
Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.
Fight the statics quo!
